subject: Loan Alan
body:
This is Cape Credit and Financial services; we are in Cape Town South 
Africa.

  	* Our interest rate is 5%, for personal loans, business loans, home 
loans, and debt consolidation loans.
  	* If you are applying a business loan, we need copy of your ID card or 
international passport, company's registration copy, three months bank 
statement, residential address, office and mobile numbers

For Personal loan: Copy of your ID or International passport, three 
months bank statements or pay slip, office and mobile numbers.

  	* It take 3 bank working day for us to verify your details, after that 
we approve if you qualify.
  	* Our loans start from $10,000 to $10Million, our monthly repayments 
start from 12months to 240months depend on the amount you loan from us,

You can go to our website and apply online.

19th Floor, Metropolitant Centre 7 Walter Sisulu Avenue 8001 Cape Town

Tel: +27 (0) 87 133 3494 51 +27 (0)78 6230103

Email: info@capecreditandfinancialservices.co.za

www. capecreditandfinancialservices.co.za

Registration No. 2018/387354/07 NCR NO. NCRCP11581

subject: Re: Loan Alan
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out and sharing information about Cape Credit and Financial services. I'm always interested in learning about different financial options. Can you tell me more about the types of loans you offer? What are the requirements for applying?

Best wishes,
Alan
